title: Is al-lawh al-Mahfouz created? ➡️(Per your request)
transcript: [Music] from bangladesh he says quran is the speech of allah so how is it mentioned in the quran that it's a book in so many places a book that we have revealed well when we talk about quran being this speech of allah and that allah has talked about it this is one of allah's attributes but we know that it is written in the preserved tablet so does this mean that the preserved tablet is not it is created
